game.name: GwenBlade: Halloween
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: MAKE DEMONS LOSE THEIR S#^T in Roguelike Horror Action when you combo them in quick succession! SLAY while investigating dreamworld kidnapping right before HALLOWEEN and most importantly - STAY STYLISH
